description:
The new Uogokoro-kun actor Nazukari Mirai and Nanako are both first years students at the same school. However, due to Mirai`s extreme shyness, they haven`t become friends. Nanako talks to her friend Noda, who attended middle school with Mirai, in order to get closer to her, but her plans don`t go well.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: On a essayé de rassembler notre courage et d`être plus familières
We Tried Gathering the Courage to Call.
勇気をだして, 呼んでみた.
